Oblitertron/Scattershot/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer/Anubis/Hades:

(TheCode, the charges Scattershot threw down, as I've repeatedly posted, are 
set to explode on impact/contact.  So if Scamrock caught the charges, they 
would've blown up in his hand)

Oblitertron yelled, a little confused from all the shots, firing off two 
plasma blasts from his rifle, and a quick burst of flames at the same time at 
the base.
-----------
Scattershot flew to the left dodging some stray shots, aiming at Scamrock, 
pullin the trigger back, letting loose 25 exploding rounds.
-----------
Unitron raised his laser rifles, firing four shots off at Sinister, four off 
at Sinesis (four from each rifle in other words).
----------
Shuko raised his rocket launcher, firing off his laser missile at the 
People's base, taking out two charges set to explode on impact, sighing, 
really not wanting to waste them on this worthless encampment.
---------
Anubis fired off three plasma blasts at Dracona, getting hit in the left arm 
by two autogun shots.
--------
Hades fired off three shots from his laser rifle at an autogun.
--------
Nemesis Enforcer raised his missile launcher, firing his last rocket off at 
the People's base, activating his com.  <Lord Zardus, the base is nearly 
gone, I request more troops, or would you like us to brake off?  If we were 
to come back and repair, by the time we attacked again, we could easily crush 
them due to extensive damaged caused by us>
